setupEmbed.title: üé´ Need Help? Create a Ticket!
setupEmbed.description: Hello! I'm here to help with your web development needs. Select the type of support you need below and I'll create a private ticket where we can discuss your project in detail.

fields.name: üåê Website Development
fields.value: Custom websites, e-commerce stores, portfolios, and business sites.

fields.name: üîß Support & Maintenance
fields.value: Bug fixes, updates, optimizations, and ongoing maintenance.

fields.name: ‚è±Ô∏è Response Time
fields.value: We typically respond within 2-4 hours during business hours.

fields.name: üíº Process
fields.value:
1. Create a ticket
2. Fill out the project form
3. Discuss requirements
4. Receive quote
5. Project completion

questions.label: What type of website do you need?
When do you need this completed?
Detailed project description
questions.placeholder: Describe requirements, features, design, target audience

support.label: Existing Project Support
support.description: Get help with an existing project

questions.label: What is the name/URL of your project?
What type of support do you need?
Detailed description of the issue
questions.placeholder: Describe problem, expected behavior, steps to reproduce

questions.label: Access information (if needed)
questions.placeholder: Admin login, FTP access, hosting info

open.message: üìù **Status Update:** Your ticket is now **Open** and awaiting review.

in_progress.message: üöÄ **Status Update:** Your project is now **In Progress**! I'm actively working on your requirements.

awaiting_client.message: ‚è≥ **Status Update:** Your ticket is **Awaiting Client Feedback**. Please review and respond when you can.

testing.message: üß™ **Status Update:** Your project is in **Testing Phase**. I'm conducting final tests and quality checks.

completed.message: ‚úÖ **Status Update:** Your project has been **Completed**! Please review the work and let me know if you need any adjustments.

on_hold.message: ‚è∏Ô∏è **Status Update:** Your ticket is currently **On Hold**. This may be due to waiting for external resources or client requirements.
